metadata.name: MESSIxFCB - END OF AN ERA
metadata.description: It was the end of an era - and the start of a new one. Messi's late-breaking move to a new team took the world by surprise and the fans by a storm. As a tribute to this G.O.A.T.'s journey. And to mark this moment in this unique collectible NFT, DexterZone presents the first collectible of #1/X G.O.A.T. NFT Collection: MESSIxFCB from the stage that left him and his fans into tears and shook the world, marking one of the most jaw-dropping sports events of 2021.
